EmailTemplate.name: NJ Schedule A
EmailTemplate.subject: NJ Countersigned Schedule A - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear SunPower Dealer, The countersigned Schedule A for {!Account.Name} has been uploaded to the lease payment object under interconnect invoice. Please feel free to contact the residential lease team at lease_wet_sign@sunpowercorp.com with any questions.
Thank you,
SunPower Residential Leasing
